item.title: Sneak Peek of Strong Typed Identifiers in Marten
item.description: If you really need to have strong typed identifier support in Marten right now, here’s the long standing workaround. Some kind of support for “strong typed identifiers” has long been a feature request for Marten from our community. I’ve even been told by a few folks that they wouldn’t consider using Marten until it did … Continue reading Sneak Peek of Strong Typed Identifiers in Marten → Link to article: https://jeremydmiller.
